title: Game Progress Route
content: efeat them, loot chest for Firestoker (X: -579 Y: 382). Altar at back with Rusted Key and Old Letter. Dark Justiciar Mail skeleton (X:-604 Y: 347), Map of Moonhaven nearby (X: -611 Y: 344). More stairs, Scimitar Mould skeleton (X: -607, Y: 322), levers move party forward. Jump to Mace Mould (x: -613, Y: 285), Waypoint nearby (X: -609, Y: 284). More skeletons, left to Splint Mould (X: -597, Y: 309). Fight 4 Animated Armor, loot Scale Mail Mould (X:-621, Y: 260), Dark Justiciar Helm skeleton (X: -
